channel.title: Irene Mecchi on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Irene Mecchi on jverkamp.com

item.title: Hercules
item.description:
I somehow managed to never watch Hercules growing up. It just wasn’t one of the Disney movies we ever had.

Which is a bit of a bummer, since that’s quite a good time! Better late than never though.

item.title: Brave
item.description: I think that if Brave where made by anyone other than Pixar, I would have absolutely loved it. Granted, that’s not really a fair comparison, but I just can’t shake the feeling.
